text.textblock: Part of A-879 described as follows: Beginning at the Northwest corner of A-879; Thence, Easterly 300 feet along the North line of A-879; Thence Southeasterly, approximately 1100 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of said Village Creek; Thence, Westerly, 100 feet, along the North line of the M. M. Bradley survey, A-7; Thence, Southerly, 4200 feet, along the east line of said A-879; Thence, Southerly, approximately 4000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 700 feet, along the South line of said A-879; Thence, N. 04
’ W., 1000 feet; Thence, along the Westerly line of said A-879 the following 4 courses: 1. N. 82
W., 6600 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of A-879, at a point which lies N. 86

E., 2000 feet from the Northwest corner of the D. C. Montgomery survey, A-39; Thence, Northeasterly, approximately 4000 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, Southerly, 2800 feet, along the East line of said A-879; Thence, S. 86
W., 1100 feet, along the South line of said A-879, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-634 described as follows: Beginning on the East line of said A-634 at a point which lies S. 03
E., 3800 feet from the Northeast corner of A-634; Thence, along the easterly line of A-634, the following 4 courses: 1. S. 03
E., 1700 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning at the Northeast corner of A-634; Thence, S. 03
E., 1500 feet, along the East line of A-634; Thence, N. 51
E., 1762 feet, along the North line of A-634, to the Point of Beginning.

Part of A-7 described as follows: Beginning at the Northwest corner of A-7; Thence, East, 100 feet along the North line of A-7, Thence, Southeasterly and Southwesterly approximately 5000 feet along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, Northerly 4200 feet along the east line of A-7 to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-7, at a point which lies N. 86

E., 3100 feet from the Northwest corner of the D. C. Montgomery survey, A-39; Thence, Northerly, 2800 feet, along the West line of said A-7; Thence, Northeasterly, approximately 1000 feet, along the easterly, gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 87
W., 600 feet, along the south line of A-7, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of said A-459 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-459, at a point which lies N. 86
E., 2600 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-459; Thence, N. 86
E., 1950 feet, along the North line of said A-459; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 2000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of said Village Creek; Thence, S. 88
W., 2050 feet, along the South line of said A-459; Thence, N. 51
W., 2000 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of said A-458 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-458 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 2550 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-458; Thence, N. 86
E., 1800 feet, along the North line of said A-458; Thence, Southwesterly, Northerly and Southeasterly, approximately 4500 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 1950 feet, along the South line of said A-458; Thence, N. 51
W., 2325 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
